    • isDestroyed

      public boolean isDestroyed()
      Returns true if every part of the Target has been hit, false otherwise. For Tank, every part of it should be hit twice.
      Overrides:
      isDestroyed in class Target
      Returns:
      if every part of the Target has been hit

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a single-character String to use in the Base's print method. This method can be used to print out locations in the Base that have been shot at.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Target
      Returns:
      a single-character String to use in the Base's print method
